title: Photo chooser improvement
body: Photo chooser  should also allow us to customize the photo chooser task like the one in Photos Hub. The photo chooser task needs to support selecting multiple pictures feature, and add an app bar to it.

comments.body: I've implement what everyone should need : A multiple photo chooser for Windows Phone 8.0
Multiple photo selections are a must. Attaching multiple photos requires re-scrolling and resuming and re-attaching a million times in an app.
This site is really dead lol.
Nevermind. No response or whatsoever from the community. The windows team can keep their superior photo chooser task to themselves and reserve the feeble version to us developers.
